definition: stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The surface of nectary with modified stoma was covered by a thin-cuticle layer with ripple sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 分泌表皮具波纹状角质层，表皮上分布有气孔器。

sentences.english: What about the other parts of the cuticle?
sentences.chinese: 有关的角质层的其他部分呢？

sentences.english: Corneous layer is formed by the horny protein cell of insensate active.
sentences.chinese: 角质层是由无生命活性的角朊细胞构成的。

sentences.english: Split ends occur when the cuticle is damaged and the fibres of the cortex unravel.
sentences.chinese: 发梢开叉是角质层受损和皮层的纤维开裂所致。

sentences.english: Kertinocytes are the cells of stratified squamous epithelia .
sentences.chinese: 角质层是复扁平上皮细胞。

sentences.english: To keep cuticles soft, I massage in olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 为保持角质层柔软，我用橄榄油加以揉按。

sentences.english: Keeping the cuticles pushed back will also help keep nails healthy.
sentences.chinese: 保持角质层推后也将有助于保持健康的指甲。

sentences.english: Hair is normally comprised of three layers, the inner medulla, the cortex and the cuticle.
sentences.chinese: 头发通常由表皮，皮质和角质层三层构成。

sentences.english: During microdermabrasion, fine crystals usually remove the superficial or uppermost layer of the epidermis, known as the stratum corneum.
sentences.chinese: 能消除表皮上面的或者凸起的部位被称为角质层。

sentences.english: Some people have hair that is more robust and with a smoother and shinier cuticle than others.
sentences.chinese: 头发的角质层强度和弹性一般和人种有很多关系。

sentences.english: Eliminates areolar tissue on cuticular layer and roughness of horny layer.
sentences.chinese: 消除表皮层的蜂窝状组织和粗糙干裂的角质层。

sentences.english: The method on biomarker study of fossil plant cuticles is briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了植物化石角质层生物标志化合物研究方法。

sentences.english: Its stem has big epidermic cells, thick cuticle, many salt glands and big vessels.
sentences.chinese: 白城红瑞木茎的表皮细胞大，角质层厚，具有。

sentences.english: This product enhances the turnover of cells for improved natural exfoliation .
sentences.chinese: 这款产品提高细胞活跃度，加速角质层代谢更新。

sentences.english: Our skin is infertile cause of cuticle.
sentences.chinese: 我们皮肤就是角质层薄的原因。

sentences.english: Ginkgo biloba on the skin, the stratum corneum is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 银杏叶的上表皮，具有明显的角质层。

definition: keratin (protein forming nails and feathers etc)
